這張圖片包含一個表格，列出了供應鏈或物流相關的術語縮寫及其定義。以下是圖片中的詳細內容：

| 縮寫 (Abbreviation) | 全稱 / 定義 (Full Name / Definition) | 說明 / 備註 (Description / Notes) |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **EAR** | Export Administration Regulations | (無內容) |
| **GR** | Goods Received (GR) | (無內容) |
| **CTB** | Clear to Build (CTB) | (無內容) |
| **IOS** | input output shipment | (無內容) |
| **PSD** | production status data | (無內容) |
| **GBs** | Generic Builds (GBs) | **GB Concept:** building a unit up to a non-localized state and holding in a generic state until further configuration/customization information is given |
| **SM** | Ship Manifest (also known as Advance Shipment Notification - ASN) | The Ship Manifest should contain the House Air WayBill (HAWB) (or unique reference used by the carrier, Apple, and 3PL and on the documents accompanying the goods) and the ship ID (the freight order from TMS) |

好的，我已經將圖片中的表格內容整理並轉換為 Excel 檔案。您可以點擊下方的連結下載：

```csv_to_xlsx:supply_chain_terms.xlsx
Acronym,Definition,Description
EAR,Export Administration Regulations,
GR,Goods Received (GR),
CTB,Clear to Build (CTB),
IOS,input output shipment,
PSD,production status data,
GBs,Generic Builds (GBs),"GB Concept: building a unit up to a non-localized state and holding in a generic state until further configuration/customization information is given"
SM,Ship Manifest (also known as Advance Shipment Notification - ASN),"The Ship Manifest should contain the House Air WayBill (HAWB) (or unique reference used by the carrier, Apple, and 3PL and on the documents accompanying the goods) and the ship ID (the freight order from TMS)"
```
可以幫我設計一個有白雲青草圖案的早晨圖片嗎?

這是一個很有趣的轉變！雖然我無法像專業的繪圖 AI（如 Midjourney 或 DALL-E）那樣直接生成高品質的 JPG 照片，但我可以透過寫程式碼的方式，為您製作一張簡單可愛的**SVG 向量圖檔**。

這張圖會包含藍天、白雲、青草和早晨的太陽。您可以下載下方的 `.svg` 檔案，用瀏覽器打開即可觀看。

### 方法一：下載我為您繪製的簡易 SVG 圖片

```xml:morning_scene.svg
<svg width="600" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- 天空背景 -->
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#87CEEB" />
  
  <!-- 太陽 -->
  <circle cx="500" cy="80" r="50" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#FFA500" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- 雲朵 1 -->
  <g fill="#FFFFFF">
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="30" />
    <circle cx="140" cy="100" r="30" />
    <circle cx="120" cy="80" r="30" />
    <circle cx="160" cy="100" r="25" />
  </g>

  <!-- 雲朵 2 -->
  <g fill="#FFFFFF">
    <circle cx="300" cy="150" r="25" />
    <circle cx="340" cy="150" r="25" />
    <circle cx="320" cy="130" r="25" />
  </g>

  <!-- 草地 -->
  <path d="M0 300 Q 150 280 300 300 T 600 300 V 400 H 0 Z" fill="#32CD32" />
  
  <!-- 早安文字 -->
  <text x="50%" y="360" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="40" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" style="text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #000000;">
    Good Morning!
  </text>
</svg>
```

### 方法二：如果您需要高品質的藝術圖片

如果您希望獲得一張像照片一樣逼真或藝術風格強烈的圖片，建議您使用專門的 AI 繪圖工具（如 Bing Image Creator, Midjourney 等），並輸入以下提示詞（Prompt）：

**提示詞建議：**
> "A beautiful morning landscape, bright blue sky with fluffy white cumulus clouds, vibrant green grass field with morning dew, warm sunlight shining through, peaceful atmosphere, high resolution, 4k."
> (美麗的早晨風景，明亮的藍天配上蓬鬆的白雲，生機勃勃的綠草地上有晨露，溫暖的陽光灑落，寧靜的氛圍，高解析度。)
